EmailTemplate.description: Auto-response when new AP case is created via email
EmailTemplate.name: SS-AP General Response
EmailTemplate.subject: Accounts Payable Helpdesk Case # {!Case.CaseNumber} has been assigned to your inquiry [{!Case.Thread_Id}] Comptes payables cas numéro {!Case.CaseNumber} a été assigné pour votre demande [{!Case.Thread_Id}]
